name: Christmas Puzzle 5
description:
Next chapter of Christmas Puzzle awaits!
Complete matching puzzle levels and create a gingerbread holiday decoration telling the story of Hansel and Gretel's journey.

Embark on a whimsical adventure and tackle a series of quests to tidy up, decorate, and build a fantastical world inspired by classic fairy tales. From cleaning cookie crumbs to creating a gingerbread house, from building a castle for mischievous witch to the chocolate factory grand opening.

Solve puzzles, light up decorations, and navigate challenges to guide the characters through their enchanting journey. Creative tasks and a touch of humor promise a magical and visually stunning experience for players of all ages. Get ready for a heartwarming conclusion as the characters find their way home.


  • 225 match-3 levels to play
  • Complete dozens of quests
  • Follow the winter story
  • Create Hensel and Gretel decoration
